scripts.dev: npm run docker-build && npm run docker-run
scripts.deploy: npm run heroku-deploy && git add . && git commit -am "Push to Github" && git push
scripts.docker-run: docker stop $(docker ps -a -q) ; docker rm $(docker ps -a -q) ; docker run -d -p $npm_package_config_servport:$npm_package_config_servport $npm_package_config_servername && open http://localhost:$npm_package_config_servport
scripts.heroku-deploy: npm run docker-clean ; npm run docker-build && npm run heroku-replace
scripts.heroku-replace: heroku apps:destroy --app $npm_package_config_servername --confirm $npm_package_config_servername && git init && heroku create $npm_package_config_servername && heroku container:push web && heroku open
scripts.docker-clean: docker rm $(docker ps -a -q) -f ; docker rmi $(docker images -q) -f
scripts.dev-latest: brew update && brew upgrade && sudo npm install -g npm
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
